alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 02 at 5:49AM MST until March 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 4000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Areas above 4000 feet near Doney Park, Flagstaff, Grand Canyon, North Rim, Sedona, Valle and Williams. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Additional snow forecast from 5 AM Today to 11 AM Today: Doney Park 0 to 1 inches Flagstaff 0 to 1 inches Grand Canyon 0 to 1 inches North Rim 0 inches Sedona 0 to 1 inches Valle 0 to 1 inches Williams 0 to 1 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim
